interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Garnier Fructis Volume Extend Instant Bodifier Dry Shampoo 3.40 oz (Pack of 2)
Review Date: 2018/12/20
Store: Garnier
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Garnier', 'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Item Weight': '0.01 Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 2.7 x 1.8 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '603084294954'}
Review Text: I like this dry shampoo because it feels so light in my hair, it doesn’t feel sticky or tough. I do not feel it gives my hair volume but it does well in cancelling excess oils and smelling good. I would repurchase but I would have preferred more volume (hence my four stars).
Review Title: Good, not perfect for me.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Mary Kay Makeup Finishing Spray by Skindinävia
Mary Kay
{'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Brand': 'Mary Kay', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 2 x 5 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
I loved how this made my makeup look but I don't feel like it made much of difference in longevity. And I am not sure my skin even likes this product because the past few times I have applied it, I would get one or two breakouts. It could be related to something else but the longer I go without this product, the few the problems I have. I prefer the skindinavia lines but don't take my word for it, this product could work for you!

I have been using this for so long and I like it but I do not know if I will continue to repurchase because I think my body has stopped responding to it. If I was in a pinch and needed something asap, I would go back to this because I know it but currently I am trying other things to see if they compare.

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Makeup and Hair Care Enthusiast**: Displays a strong interest in makeup application as well as hair care products, valuing aesthetics and presentation.

- **Spray Preference**: Favors lightweight, easy-to-apply spray-form products for both makeup and hair, indicating a clear preference for practicality and ease of use.

- **Skin and Scalp Sensitivity**: Prone to breakouts with certain makeup products and sensitive to hair product reactions, suggesting careful consideration of ingredients and a cautious approach to new items.

- **Brand Loyalty**: Shows a preference for established brands, valuing trusted reputations, particularly in both makeup and hair care.

- **Mixed Experience with Performance**: Appreciates the visual effects of products but remains critical of their performance and skin/scalp compatibility, leading to thorough evaluations of efficacy.

- **Cautious Experimentation**: Open to trying different products but tends to favor those with proven track records regarding skin and scalp health, balancing familiarity with exploration.

- **Adaptable but Skeptical**: Currently assessing alternatives to long-used products due to decreased effectiveness, showcasing a willingness to explore new options while relying on familiarity during needs.

- **Attention to Functionality**: While satisfied with the overall experience of certain products, the user seeks improved performance outcomes, such as increased volume for hair care products, reflecting high standards for usability and results.

Overall, the user values products for their enhancement capabilities while prioritizing skin and scalp health, demonstrating a thoughtful and adaptable approach to experimentation.
